text:
I just downloaded mega sized apache-ant-1.6beta2-bin.tar
And found the trick apache used to increase its footprint size
It contains 200 .bak files which takes up size of around 1516 KB.
All the .bak files are backup files of html files, seems you guys used some 
tool to edit html file which inturn generated those bak files.

Should be fix asap, as I am not happy to see worlds best build tool to have 
unnecessary files in its build process.
creator: hemants22@yahoo.com

text:
Yes, this is true, this is an error.
Antoine
creator: antoine@apache.org

text: OK, I'll close as fixed for beta 3
creator: conor@apache.org
